headline: Universal Health Services (UHS): Among the Best Healthcare Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Best Healthcare Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Universal Health Services, Inc. (NYSE:UHS) stands against other best healthcare stocks to invest in. Healthcare stocks experienced a challenging year in 2024, lagging behind high-growth sectors like tech […]
